executable.title: BRAINS Binary Mask Editor Based On Landmarks(BRAINS)

image.name: inputBinaryVolume
image.label: Input Binary Volume Filename
image.description: Input binary image in which to be edited

image.name: outputBinaryVolume
image.label: Output Binary Volume Filename
image.description: Output binary image in which to be edited

file.name: inputLandmarksFilename
file.label: Input Landmarks Filename
file.description: The filename for the landmark definition file in the same format produced by Slicer3 (.fcsv).

string-vector.name: inputLandmarkNames
string-vector.label: Input Landmark Names
string-vector.description: A target input landmark name to be edited. This should be listed in the inputLandmakrFilename Given.

string-vector.name: setCutDirectionForLandmark
string-vector.label: Set Cut Direction For Landmark
string-vector.description: Setting the cutting out direction of the input binary image to the one of anterior, posterior, left, right, superior or posterior. (ENUMERATION: ANTERIOR, POSTERIOR, LEFT, RIGHT, SUPERIOR, POSTERIOR)

string-vector.name: setCutDirectionForObliquePlane
string-vector.label: Set Cut Direction For Oblique Plane Negative
string-vector.description: If this is true, the mask will be thresholded out to the direction of inferior, posterior, and/or left. Default behavrior is that cutting out to the direction of superior, anterior and/or right.

string-vector.name: inputLandmarkNamesForObliquePlane
string-vector.label: Input Landmark Names For Oblique Plane
string-vector.description: Three subset landmark names of inputLandmarksFilename for a oblique plane computation. The plane computed for binary volume editing.
